text:
Flexport - San Francisco, Ca

Flexport is a platform for global trade backed by Google Ventures, First Round Capital, Bloomberg, and Y Combinator. We make it easier for companies of all sizes to ship products anywhere in the world from a single online dashboard.

We are now looking for senior engineers to join our small but elite team in SAn Francisco. See Flexport.com/careers or email jobs@flexport.com to apply.
